price: [Recuerda] que envié a Noé a su pueblo [y les dijo]: "He sido enviado para ustedes como un amonestador evidente,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
